data.question: There are four common reasons people choose not to speak up when faced with an ethical dilemma. Which of the reasons best aligns with this statement: “I don’t know if I have the competence and confidence to speak up about ethical issues when they arise.”

response.content: That is incorrect. Fear is better described by the statement “I am afraid of what will happen if I speak up and raise a concern.”
That is incorrect. Rationalization is better described by the statement, “I have reasons and rationalizations to explain why I’m not speaking up or acting on my values.”
That is incorrect. Response is the perspective that “I’m only going to speak up if I think I will be successful in resolving my concern.”
That is correct. Skill is about questioning whether you have the competence and confidence to speak up about ethical issues when they arise.
response.showAnswer: The correct answer is D. Skill is about questioning whether you have the competence and confidence to speak up about ethical issues when they arise.
